chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
f: R -> R
m: R
b: R
a: R

Goal:
(forall x : R, Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b -> m <= f x) -> is_finite (Inf_fct f a b)

Premises:
Inf_fct = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => if Req_EM_T a b then Finite 0 else Glb_Rbar (fun y : R => exists x : R, y = f x /\ Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Rbar Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
*** [ R : Set ]
Rmax = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then y else x : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
is_finite = fun x : Rbar => x = x : Rbar -> Prop
Rmin = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then x else y : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
Sup_fct_maj : forall (f : R -> R) (a b M : R), (forall x : R, Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b -> f x <= M) -> is_finite (Sup_fct f a b)
Inf_fct_le : forall (f : R -> R) (a b x : R), Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b -> Rbar_le (Inf_fct f a b) (f x)
Sup_fct_le : forall (f : R -> R) (a b x : R), Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b -> Rbar_le (f x) (Sup_fct f a b)
StepFun_P37 : forall (a b : R) (f g : StepFun a b), a <= b -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> f x <= g x) -> RiemannInt_SF f <= RiemannInt_SF g
ex_Im_fct : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), a <> b -> exists x x0 : R, x = f x0 /\ Rmin a b < x0 < Rmax a b
Sup_fct = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => if Req_EM_T a b then Finite 0 else Lub_Rbar (fun y : R => exists x : R, y = f x /\ Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Rbar Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
RiemannInt_P2 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (un : nat -> posreal) (vn wn : nat -> StepFun a b), Un_cv (fun x : nat => un x) 0 -> a <= b -> (forall n : nat, (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - vn n t) <= wn n t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF (wn n)) < un n) -> {l : R | Un_cv (fun N : nat => RiemannInt_SF (vn N)) l}
RiemannInt_P11 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b l : R) (un : nat -> posreal) (phi1 phi2 psi1 psi2 : nat -> StepFun a b), Un_cv (fun x : nat => un x) 0 -> (forall n : nat, (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi1 n t) <= psi1 n t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF (psi1 n)) < un n) -> (forall n : nat, (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi2 n t) <= psi2 n t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF (psi2 n)) < un n) -> Un_cv (fun N : nat => RiemannInt_SF (phi1 N)) l -> Un_cv (fun N : nat => RiemannInt_SF (phi2 N)) l
StepFun_P6 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), IsStepFun f a b -> IsStepFun f b a
RiemannInt_P3 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (un : nat -> posreal) (vn wn : nat -> StepFun a b), Un_cv (fun x : nat => un x) 0 -> (forall n : nat, (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - vn n t) <= wn n t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF (wn n)) < un n) -> {l : R | Un_cv (fun N : nat => RiemannInt_SF (vn N)) l}
Inf_fct_bound : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), Inf_fct f a b = Inf_fct f b a
RInt_val_ext : forall (f0 g : R -> ?V) (a0 b0 : R) (n : nat), (forall x : R, Rmin a0 b0 <= x <= Rmax a0 b0 -> f0 x = g x) -> RInt_val g a0 b0 n = RInt_val f0 a0 b0 n where ?V : [f : R -> R a : R b : R m : R |- ModuleSpace R_Ring]
StepFun_P2 : forall (a b : R) (f : R -> R) (l lf : Rlist), adapted_couple f a b l lf -> adapted_couple f b a l lf
StepFun_P17 : forall (f : R -> R) (l1 l2 lf1 lf2 : Rlist) (a b : R), adapted_couple f a b l1 lf1 -> adapted_couple f a b l2 lf2 -> Int_SF lf1 l1 = Int_SF lf2 l2
StepFun_P34 : forall (a b : R) (f : StepFun a b), a <= b -> Rabs (RiemannInt_SF f) <= RiemannInt_SF {| fe := fun x : R => Rabs (f x); pre := StepFun_P32 f |}
StepFun_P28 : forall (a b l : R) (f g : StepFun a b), IsStepFun (fun x : R => f x + l * g x) a b
fe : forall a b : R, StepFun a b -> R -> R
maj_term2 : forall (x h eps l1 alp_f2 alp_f2t2 : R) (eps_f2 : posreal) (f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < alp_f2t2 -> Rabs (f2 (x + a) - f2 x) < Rabs (eps * (f2 x)² / (8 * l1))) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 -> Rabs h < alp_f2t2 ->...-> Rabs (l1 / (f2 x * f2 (x + h)) * (f2 x - f2 (x + h))) < eps / 4
RiemannInt_SF : forall a b : R, StepFun a b -> R
maj_term4 : forall (x h eps l2 alp_f2 alp_f2c : R) (eps_f2 : posreal) (f1 f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < alp_f2c -> Rabs (f2 (x + a) - f2 x) < Rabs ((f2 x)² * f2 x * eps / (8 * f1 x * l2))) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 ->...-> Rabs (l2 * f1 x / ((f2 x)² * f2 (x + h)) * (f2 (x + h) - f2 x)) < eps / 4
mkStepFun : forall (a b : R) (fe : R -> R), IsStepFun fe a b -> StepFun a b
maj_term1 : forall (x h eps l1 alp_f2 : R) (eps_f2 alp_f1d : posreal) (f1 f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall h0 : R, h0 <> 0 -> Rabs h0 < alp_f1d -> Rabs ((f1 (x + h0) - f1 x) / h0 - l1) < Rabs (eps * f2 x / 8)) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 -> Rabs h < alp_f1d ->...-> Rabs (/ f2 (x + h) * ((f1 (x + h) - f1 x) / h - l1)) < eps / 4
maj_term3 : forall (x h eps l2 alp_f2 : R) (eps_f2 alp_f2d : posreal) (f1 f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall h0 : R, h0 <> 0 -> Rabs h0 < alp_f2d -> Rabs ((f2 (x + h0) - f2 x) / h0 - l2) < Rabs ((f2 x)² * eps / (8 * f1 x))) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) ->...-> Rabs (f1 x / (f2 x * f2 (x + h)) * ((f2 (x + h) - f2 x) / h - l2)) < eps / 4
Rabs_lt_between_Rmax : forall x m M : R, m < x < M -> Rabs x < Rmax M (- m)
subdivision : forall a b : R, StepFun a b -> Rlist
subdivision_val : forall a b : R, StepFun a b -> Rlist
RInt_val = fun (V : ModuleSpace R_Ring) (f : R -> V) (a b : R) (n : nat) => Riemann_sum f (SF_seq_f2 (fun x y : R => (x + y) / 2) (unif_part a b n)) : forall V : ModuleSpace R_Ring, (R -> V) -> R -> R -> nat -> V Argument V is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope R_scope R_scope nat_scope]
StepFun_P1 : forall (a b : R) (f : StepFun a b), adapted_couple f a b (subdivision f) (subdivision_val f)
StepFun_P30 : forall (a b l : R) (f g : StepFun a b), RiemannInt_SF {| fe := fun x : R => f x + l * g x; pre := StepFun_P28 l f g |} = RiemannInt_SF f + l * RiemannInt_SF g
Rmax_neg : forall x y : R, x < 0 -> y < 0 -> Rmax x y < 0

```coq
intros f m b a.
intros H : (forall x : R, Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b -> m <= f x) -> is_finite (Inf_fct f a b).
unfold Inf_fct.
destruct (Req_EM_T a b) as [H_eq | H_ne].
  simpl. apply is_finite_Finite.
  apply Sup_fct_bound.
  intro x.
  apply H.
  assumption.
apply Sup_fct_bound.
intro x.
apply H.
assumption.
Qed.
